items.text: To the chief Musician on Neginoth, A Psalm or Song of Asaph.
items.plainText: To the chief Musician on Neginoth, A Psalm or Song of Asaph.

items.text: In Judah is God known: his name is great in Israel.
items.plainText: In Judah is God known: his name is great in Israel.

items.text: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.
items.plainText: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.

items.text: There brake he the arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the battle. Selah.
items.plainText: There brake he the arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the battle. Selah.

items.text: Thou art more glorious and excellent than the mountains of prey.
items.plainText: Thou art more glorious and excellent than the mountains of prey.

items.text: The stouthearted are spoiled, they have slept their sleep: and none of the men of might have found their hands.
items.plainText: The stouthearted are spoiled, they have slept their sleep: and none of the men of might have found their hands.

items.text: At thy rebuke, O God of Jacob, both the chariot and horse are cast into a dead sleep.
items.plainText: At thy rebuke, O God of Jacob, both the chariot and horse are cast into a dead sleep.

items.text: Thou, even thou, art to be feared: and who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry?
items.plainText: Thou, even thou, art to be feared: and who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry?

items.text: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth feared, and was still,
items.plainText: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth feared, and was still,

items.text: When God arose to judgment, to save all the meek of the earth. Selah.
items.plainText: When God arose to judgment, to save all the meek of the earth. Selah.

items.text: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.
items.plainText: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.

items.text: Vow, and pay unto the LORD your God: let all that be round about him bring presents unto him that ought to be feared.
items.plainText: Vow, and pay unto the LORD your God: let all that be round about him bring presents unto him that ought to be feared.

items.text: He shall cut off the spirit of princes: he is terrible to the kings of the earth.
items.plainText: He shall cut off the spirit of princes: he is terrible to the kings of the earth.
